name: 21ST CENTURY PRIVACY COALITION
sampleDescriptions: Privacy and data security legislation. No specific bills.
Privacy and data security legislation.  No specific bills.
Privacy and data security legislation; H.R. 6866 and S. 3749 (Public Health Emergency Privacy Act (PHEPA)); S. 3663 (COVID-19 Consumer Data Protection Act of 2020).
Privacy and data security legislation; S. 3663 - Kids Online Safety Act; and S. 1628 - Children and Teens' Online Privacy Protection Act.

Privacy and data security legislation; S. 3663 - Kids Online Safety Act; and S. 1628 - Children and Teens' Online Privacy Protection Act. H.R.8152 - To provide consumers with foundational data privacy rights, create strong oversight mechanisms, and establish meaningful enforcement.
Privacy and data security legislation; H.R.8818 - American Privacy Rights Act; H.R.7890 - Children and Teens Online Privacy Protection Act; H.R.7891 - Kids Online Safety Act.
